text: Thanks Carter :bow:  let me know how it goes

Hey I made a few custom workflow actions that are experiencing an issue I could use some advice on. The custom workflow action fires off the request to my app server, and the server successfully receives and processes the request. However, I guess it doesn't respond back to HubSpot within some unspecified timeframe, so the workflow action retries, causing a duplicate request to fire. This causes the custom action to fire twice in my app, which I want to prevent. Any clue on what the timeout of these actions is or what I could do to resolve?

> thereâ€™s a 20sec timeout and can use up to 128 mb of memory, everything above will cause an error.
Found that in an earlier thread.
